content.detailedDescription: See the detailed case report i wrote up since i am a mufon investigator and the assistant state director for oregon.  you can go to oregonmufon.Com to download a copy of the case report if you are from the public.
content.summary: A sighting of one clustered, luminescent ufo consisting of one blue, one white, and one red, more or less spherical orbs are seen “drifting” in daylight blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was a mail courier for the fed. gov.. one day i was making my late a.M. run to a radar site on the point arguello side of vandenburg a.F.B. when on my way up a mountain an m.P. flagged me down to a stop and asked me to wait. i asked him why and he said a missile was launching. the titan 3d launched and as it appeared above the hilltop a metallic disc appeared along side it. the ufo stayed alongside it for about 10 seconds then shot up and to the west very fast. the ufo was about half the diameter of the titan and maybe 15 feet thick. it also had a mirror like effect along it's outer edge. i was in awe at what i saw. i looked in my mirror and nobody was behind me. i got out and shouted at the m.P. but he motioned for me to get back into my truck. the m.P. got into his truck and drove past me very fast. after i made my run i told my boss and he said to keep it to myself. he was also my foster dad so i respected his wishes.
content.summary: Ufo in the vicinity of a titan 3d launch.

content.detailedDescription: I already reported incident.  i told david twichell from trenton michigan i would send this sketch over to him a couple of weeks ago.  i think he is in charge of the michigan sightings for mufon.......Please tell me if the sketch went through.....
content.summary: Triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: I already reported incident.  i told david twichell from trenton michigan i would send this sketch over to him a couple of weeks ago.  i think he is in charge of the michigan sightings for mufon.......
content.summary: Triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 10pm on saturday, october 14th, 2006.  i walked out onto my back deck to enjoy the crisp, cool night.  the heavens sparkled above me, even the milky way was clearly visible.  after about 10 minutes of gazing north, i turned around so i could gaze at the stars behind me, the southern sky.  when i turned, a flickering light caught my attention.  i watched the light for a moment, believing it to be merely a fading or twinkling star.  however, the longer i stood and stared, the more it became clear it was not a star.  i can only describe the flashing as if someone were cutting a flashlight on and then off again.  after approximately 1 minute of flashing every 5-7 seconds, a second object(on the first object's left)flashed once.  then the initial object began to move in a northerly direction.  for whatever reason, it turned back to where it began.  this went on for a few minutes, back and forth.  i ran in and retrieved my fiance, who came out in time to see the object moving and flashing, one last bright flash and then one final fading flash.  the object ceased all activity and was not seen again, even though we stayed up for hours searching the night sky for it. this all occurred roughly within a 5 minute time span.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Peculiar lights over small georgia town!

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were in my bedroom lying on the bed with candles lit and started talking about aliens and invading the earth just then what appeared on the closet door was an image of an alien body with a big head and long arms and long legs a full body.  i said to my boyfriend do you see whats on the closet door and he said yes and said that looks like an alien and he went right into denial saying it was a street light shadow and i said that is a body and started pointing that out to him i was excited and could not believe what iwas seeing and my boyfiend kept saying it was something else we then got a little involved with each other and when i looked up maybe fifteen minutes had gone by i said to him it is still there shortly after that it went away.

i forgot something about the figure and that it was moving its head from side to side as if it was telling us no.

another encounter with the ufo was in 1992 when i was upstairs in my apartment i had layed down with my daughter and i saw flashing red and blue lights in the skylight thinking it was a police car or ambulance i didnt pay much attention to it until i layed down and just as i closed my eyes i was up in space and could see the milkyway and was scared and fasinated at the same time then i opened my eyes and said to my self what the hell was that and closed my eyes again and i was back there i wished i had kept them shut a little longer but i didnt know what was happening but what makes it so real was how quite and still it was.
before this happened i was always afraid seeing astronauts in space but after being up there i no longer am afraid but i am fasinated now with all of it.  i know both of these incidents happened in a bedroom but i was fully awake.
content.summary: Projected image

content.detailedDescription: My 15 year-old son called me last night excited about this sighting that he had about one mile from my house, between 7 and 8pm, (central time). he said that he and his friends were outside and observed a triangular, whitish, large shape move silently across the sky.  he observed that it appeared to be a little lower than where a small aircraft would fly, but that its size was larger than would be of an airplane. there were no navigational lights or sounds associated with it.  it was headed in an easterly direction. he also stated that it seemed almost translucent, or see-thru. his location was in mid-de soto, kansas; a small town about halfway between kansas city and lawrence.
content.summary: My 15 yr old son saw a triangular shaped ufo, whitish colored, moving silently

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home after work and i usually drive on lonely roads to get home faster. around 2:00a.M. in the morning, i happened to look up in the sky because i saw an object with brights colorful lights and it didn't move for a moment, it just stood there for at least 3 minutes. 

when i saw it, i said to myself, oh! look at those lights, their nice! but then i got scared. the object started to get closer and i stepped on the gas to get home faster. there was no cars on the road. i wanted to stop and park the car and off the headlights, but then i said, no, i should just get home now! i kepted looking at the ufo and all of sudden thee ufo fled away real fast. i've never seen something like this before.

days later on october 8,2006, i was going home and far out in the fields near  the merced river, i saw an huge bright orange glow, i thought it must be a fire burning so i called gustine police. then the next day, i saw it again, the same orange glow, but this time it was less glow. the orange glow looked like fire but there didn't seem to be smoke. i checked in the newspaper for fires and there was no reports of fires.
content.summary: The ufo had different color of lights and it was disc shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was around 13 or 14 at the time, i lived in hillside colony in stillwater n.Y my friend and i would always be hang out after our parents were asleep, mostly in my room which faced alot of woods at the time. we would see so many strange objects that seem to be very bouncy and quick, but one night sticks with myself for some reason,iwas talking to her through my windows which were kinda of like bay windows and out of nowhere a big circular object was hoovering over the trailer across the road, we were both in complete shock and speechless. after awhile we started to enjoy looking at the sky to see what we would see it was exciting but also spooky. but then i had an unusual expierence that i never spoke about until i was an adult, one night while going to sleep these three small grey objects were standing around my bed i remember trying to move and scream but it was if i was frozen i was scared to death and never said a word to mother until a few years ago, i'm not quite sure what happen during the time they were standing over but this truly did happen and i saw an article in the troy record today that sent chills down my spine so i figured i would write down my story because it just took my breathe away when i read it. i have told my children about what happened to me because i deeply know there is another form of life out there. thank you for your time! and i never said a word to nobody in fear of embarassment until afew years ago,my mother asked why i did not tell her sooner and i explained i did not think she would understand than.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: There were many small quick objects that flew low down at times

content.detailedDescription:
0
0
0
0
0
0
 0
0
     i have had a renewed interest in astronomy,was in my back yard looking
at andromeda,m-31 in particular,when these dimly lit objects,came into my field of view! i was observing with my 7x50 binoculars,please note the above line of circles,this is what the objects looked liked.They transited my field quite quickly,if i did not track them!Absolutely no sound!!!! i know aircraft,not a sailplane,dark-32degrees,no hot air balloon,nor a blimp,or a helicopter!! then i thought,geese,again no noise,no honking,and they were moving way to fast for geese!! these objects moved steadily from north to south and quickly left my area! i know this stuff happens all the time,the sky was clear,this event was not a reflection,and it sure as hell was not swamp gas!!!  i came into the house,told my wife what i saw,then called my brother-in-law,he has interest in astronomy also!
no man made objects that i know of moves like these objects did!

                                               thank you,
                                                 jerry vencalek
                                                 october 13th,2006
content.summary: Objects moving north to south- 8 circles dimly lit stacked,one above the other!

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep early this morning when my wife woke me up to look at something strange in the sky. she said she had been watching this object for about 10 minutes before she realized this was not an airplane, balloon, helicopter or anything like that. i looked out the window to the southeast, and observed a large white glowing sphere....Not really moving at this point. after watching it for a minute or two, i quickly dismissed it as just a bright star. i was about to call my wife crazy and return to bed when the sphere suddenly started moving around in an elliptical circle extremely fast. once again using a star as a guide, i did notice the erattic movement. after doing that for a minute or two, the object quickly shot forward a bit, back to its original position, and then side to side. it's speed was way beyond anything i had ever seen, and plus it moved in a direct linear line. it's speed was tremendous. 
     we watched it move about for a good half an hour, before it shot straight up into the sky....Completetly dissappearing.
     i am a firm beleiver that we are not alone, and i have seen many strange things....But i have never seen an object that moved through a clear starlit sky like this did. i still have chills just thinking that i actually saw what i saw.
     i wonder if anyone else might have seen the same thing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw a very bright globe object moving in an oval pattern, and the shooting from side to side, and forward and back. using a close star as a gauge, this object was definitely not of this world. the pattern and speed of its movement was incredible.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my wife to dialysis apt. when i saw an object that was drifting behind a sign and seemd fairly low to the ground. i was making a turn onto kitzke heading north after heading east on plumb, to 1500 second street. i am not sure what i saw. i am not sure if my wife saw it so, i did not ask her anything. i just kept driving. till  i saw the comercial to report this i did not think about it anymore.
i did not feel dumbfounded or any thing more aof a curiosity. i was too busy driving and and went on my way. 
it looked like polished silver with pentagonal panels on the sides as i was driving by. it was early evening but did not have any storms in the area.
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription:
It was afternoon about the end of the pool being opned for the seadson. some one at the pool said what is that and everyone was looking up. about 7 (seven) people were there incluiding myself. i was reading under a tree and almost did not look to see what was there. i finally got up and looked at about a 50 degree deflection and the "object" was sitting there in the sky. it did not appear to have any known characteristics of conventional aircraft and seemed "stationary". this was after 5 minutes of others looking at this. another few minutes went by and the other indiviuals were looking up watching it. i looked at it shortly for a minute or two, but still remember it. then i went and sat down under the tree and continued to read. then they claimed it disapeared and i got up again and looked for longer than when i first saw it. i did not see it in the area. so i paid no further attention to it. i did not have a camera or other recording devices. it was a clear day and not too bright. and the sun was behind me and/or not in my eyes.

i have since moved to a new apt. in the same complex but phone remains the same.

i thought at first is was something but not able to describe in my mind. i did not ask the other people at my location if they knew or asked them what they thought of it.

my health was ok or stable and i had bee out of back surgery for at least a year and i was then currently taking medications for chronic back pain. i had been taking meds for at least 3 years up to the event.
if there are any questions to whomever may see this.
content.summary: At the pool

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture from my fron yard thursday 10/12/2006 about 10:40am. i took two originals about 15 to 30 seconds apart and they came out the same so i know the zoom on the camera was in focus. the originals are very clear and easy to see. i am attaching the two originals and one enhancement of the first original just for a larger view.
content.summary: Strange object in clear blue daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture from my fron yard thursday 10/12/2006 about 10:40am. i took two originals about 15 to 30 seconds apart and they came out the same so i know the zoom on the camera was in focus. the originals are very clear and easy to see. i am attaching the two originals and one enhancement of the first original just for a larger view.
content.summary: Strange looking object in clear blue daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture from my front yard thursday 10/12/2006 about 10:40am. i took two originals about 15 to 30 seconds apart and they came out the same so i know the zoom on the camera was in focus. the originals are very clear and easy to see. i am attaching the two originals and one enhancement of the first original just for a larger view.
content.summary: Strange white object in clear daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were out for a drive in the south broadway/hampton area when all of a sudden we saw what appeared to be two planes flying extremley low to the ground. upon further inspection, we noticed that the "planes" were connected to eachother by a beam of light, and that what we had thought to be the triad pattern of lights often seen on planes at night was acutally a part of this strange object. the best possible description of its appearence is that it was one larger triangular shape lined with red and blue lights connected to a similar but smaller triangular shape. it moved very fast and sparatically making no noise at all. it was able to turn very sharply. the larger and smaller triangular components of the object always moved relative to eachother, maintaining a perfect connection.  after aproximatley two minutes of what appeared to be random motion, the object suddenly flew away into the distance until it was no longer visible. at this point, my friends and i were positive that what we saw was not a plane/helicopter/weather ballon due to the apparent high velocity the object was able to reach in such a short amount of time, and the complexity of its movement. my emotions at this time were shock, excitement, and amazement of what i had just seen. after the object had been gone for about 6 minutes, it suddenly reappeared very close to us, approximatly 50 yards above our car. after flying around the area for for about a minute, the object came to an abrupt stop above a residential area, about four blocks away from our car. at this point, we stopped the car and i was able to get a better look at the object. the "light beam" connection was actually a very well lit solid connection and dark window shapes could be made out on the smaller of the two triangles. i glanced down the street and noticed that several other cars had stopped to observe the object as well. after it hovered for a few seconds, it began to descend and landed on the ground. we immediatley tried to drive to where it had landed, but could not find anything. the object had apparently dissapeared or become invisible upon landing. we searced the area where it appeared to have landed intensly for about a half and hour but could find nothing. three helicopters arrived and appeared to be activley searching during the this time, and for the remainder of the night we could see/hear helicopters near the area of the sighting. throughout the entire sighting i never felt afraid, i just felt amazed beyond belief and lucky to have seen this object.
content.summary: Two separate solid structures that were triangular connected by a beam of light

content.detailedDescription: Ok.. i have always "believed", but never have never seen any "proof\" with my own eye's... not straight out in front of my face proof... but. not in my life have i actually seen anything like this... actually made my day.. long story short.. about 2:45pm walked to the outside bay door to get some air and saw about 40% of the shop standing outside staring at the sky.. ok.. said to myself.. this has to be good..... tree line was semi blocking my view and asked wtf was going on.. moved over and saw what everyone was looking at.... well.. there was about 40 of us on the particular end of the shop looking at the same thing and wondering wtf is that.. calling horizon .. zero degree's.. at about 75 / 80 degree's  up from the horizon line straight, north east... ( would of appeared to be straight above fairwood area, but if you were to project out mileage couldn't tell you exactly above where it was actually at..  from standing within 1/2 mile of auburn valley drive inn movie theater... was 5  white/silver -  prominent objects in the sky. not too far away,  but actually there to know, that something was  there... "they" / "something" sat there, more like very slowly "hovered / barely moved"  around for about 10 minutes, then the 2 on the left side got closer, then they moved apart.. then 3 of the 5 slowly moved a little to the right.. then all disappeared all together about 15 minutes later.. robb
content.summary: Prominent " objects" stationary / in formation/ slowly moving ..Obviously visable...

content.detailedDescription: At 11:00 pm this october 10th, my wife and i experienced another "rumbling roar", the first of which happened on feburary 16th, 1995.  that event also had a visual sighting of 2 strobbing lights in an elongated triangle shape that didn't move for 5 minutes, finally drifting slowly to the west.  it produced the same sound we heard two nights ago.  i searched the overcast sky for at least 4 minutes and found nothing this time.  in 1995, others in the area heard or saw the same lights, it was reported to the faa, and there were multipule sightings in michigan, nearly due west of here.  i'm filing this because others in my area may have actually seen something.  the nicap site has a complete discription of the 95 events.
content.summary: Rumbling roar heard for 5 minutes overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch, having a smoke.  i heard a low-flying helicopter traveling west to east.  it was probably five miles away when i heard it. i soon saw it come into view, a blue light in back, a white light in front.  the sky was dark.  the helicopter followed a path that most military aircraft tend to, when flying over olympia.  it takes them across the vantage of the sky i have in front of my house. this one came from the west, and flew in front of my house.  i paid it a little attention, as it was loud.  it seemed to be flying low.  i watched it as it came through the trees and into the view i have of the northern sky. that's when i noticed the red ball of light in front of the helicopter. it was as if the chopper was chasing the light.  the distance between the two objects was slight, and remained constant.  they flew across the break in the trees, where i could clearly see the objects, quite quickly, and by the time i realized what i was seeing, and retrieved my camera, the objects were obscured by trees.  they arced northward and i didn't see them again. the sky was clear.  the light was smaller than the helicopter. there was no searchlight beam shining from the helicopter.  it really looked like the helicopter was chasing the light. i'm enclosing the video i took, but it's terrible quality.  maybe it can be cleaned up by someone with the right equipment, but i'm not sure it will show anything of value anyway.  probably a lot of the helicopter's lights and tree limbs. i don't believe there was a sound coming from the light, though it's hard to say, because the helicopter was very loud.  it was a large helicopter, with a deep, low sound.
content.summary: I watched a helicopter chase a red light across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbors and a friend from out of town were walking around our cul-de-sac at approximately 9:15 or 9:20. it was dark due to the lack of street lights in the rural area in which we reside. my friend suddenly asked if we had just seen that. we hadn't the slightest clue what she was talking about, so we asked if she could please elaborate on 'that'. she said that as we walked past my other neighbors house, she noticed a bright light that appeared to be a star descending slowly from the sky. 

    she described it as star like with a slighly bluish tint, and told us that it appeared to be right behind the trees behind my neighbors house and had slowly descended until it disappeared. i had made sure to ask how it had disappeared, and she said that she had thought that it had slowly dimmed until it was no longer visable. i had also made sure to inquire whether or not she had been simply seeing things. she said she had looked away and blinked a few times before looking back. we had immediately walked behind my friend's house with a mini-maglite (which i had just happened to have been carrying at the time) and examined the area around the trees. my original theory was that a piece of aluminum foil, carried into the trees by the previous days wind, had finally been loosed and reflected moonlight as it fell (the moon was full that night,i believe).
finding nothing we returned to my neighbors house and discussed possible explainations. this account is taken from my memory of her desciption from the date of the sighting, so it may have slight deviations from her exact testimony.

    after we had all headed home, approximately 10 pm, i researched other cases describing a bright light that appeared to be descending from the sky on nuforc.Com and have formed a more plausible theory that my friend had actually seen the light of a celestial body reflected off of a passing sattelite. i have a limited knowledge of sattelites, but using this knowledge, i have formed this hypothesis. a sattelite had angled itself such that the light hitting it had been reflect to our position on earth. the sattelite continued to angle itself towards what would be the ground to earthly veiwers. the light appeared to be descending and as the sattelite continued to angle, less light was hitting it directly and was being reflected towards us until no light was being reflected at all. if this theory were correct and my assumptions are unflawed, i believe this would account for the apparent dimming of the light.
content.summary: Strange light descends from sky; appears to be in close proximety to trees

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving north on dickerson and he noticed a flock of white birds that you can see one minute and dissapear the next.  i looked to see the birds and didn't see them but, i saw a large white sphere in the sky that did not appear to be moving. it was not metallic or glowing, just large and white. i pointed it out and we had no idea what it was.  i then saw the birds fly by and i could tell by the size of the birds that this object seemed very large.  it was too low in the sky to be a planet and too big to be a ballon.  i saw several planes fly over it and it seemed to be about the same size as a plane.  i was able to see the object in the sky as we drove north on i-35 from carrollton to lake dallas. i finally lost sight of it in lake dallas. it never appeared to move.  oddly, this object appeared 1 hour after sonic booms were heard from f-16 test flights of lockhead martin planes.  about 3 hours later, we drove back to carrollton and the object was gone.
content.summary: Large white sphere over texas

content.detailedDescription:
It was a mostly sunny day, but a little windy and big clouds were passing through the area.  as i walked out my front door i noticed to my south a small shiny circle/sphere high in the sky just hanging there.  clouds were moving past but this object did not move.  if it were a balloon, it would've moved with the wind/clouds.  i live on the southern edge of towne lake, so i estimate the object was high over the highway 92 area.  it occurred to me that if ufos exist, this is probably what to look for, but i dismissed it since it was in the middle of a sunny day and the area is heavily populated (atlanta suburb).  i assumed there had to be an explanation and i was running late to meet my wife, so i got in my car and drove away.

recently, i was watching tv and saw a reported sighting (i think in canada a few years ago) that looked exactly like what i saw - a small silver sphere/circle just hanging in the sky on a sunny / partly cloudy day.

i wish i would've trusted my initial instinct and grabbed my camera!  i've been comparing it to the time when, a few years ago, i woke up in the middle of the night, felt the bed sway a little and thought to myself "if we had earthquakes in georgia, i bet that's what it'd feel like" and fell right back to sleep.  then, in the morning, the news reports are abuzz over the small earthquake felt in the atlanta area.  if it hadn't been for the news reports, i would've forgotten all about the swaying bed, assuming it was nothing.
content.summary: Small shiny/silver object in sky, not moving (march or april '04, woodstock)

content.detailedDescription: Just a bit ago, at 7:48-750pm, i saw, for the second time this month, very bright red pulsating lights on an object traveling fairly slowly across the western sky from southwest torrance toward lax, or from the se toward the nw, heading toward lax. i was stargazing in my front driveway in southwest torrance,ca, and was admiring the totally clear sky.  many regular aircraft were going about their business, and were unremarkable.  a bit earlier i had seen two different satellites..One going from sw to nw, the other , a bit later, going from nw to se. i had even witnessed a brief "shooting star" from west to east. by 7:47pm i was wrapping up my binocs, and making my regular evening preparations, when i saw the blinking red lights. i was facing west. this time i had my binocs, and tried to get a glimpse of the lights...I could vaguely make out sort of a triangular-ish or boomerang shape, with the lights blinking in an erratic pattern all about.  there seemed to be 5 lights. they all moved together, as if connected to a giant platform or object that was very very large and quiet. there were at least two commercial aircraft in the same vicinity, but they looked very tiny compared to the spanse of this object.  it kind of just floated or sailed across the sky.  i was not as frightened this time, as i have read other reports these past few days, and am inclined to think that this is some kind of really huge experimental flying platform. i watched it as it slowly drifted away(towards lax), and could no longer be seen because of my neighbor's house. if our airforce is the organization flying these giant craft, then, since the secret is out, they should let the public know what they are flying. otherwise, seeing such can be a bit unnerving, even for skywatchers like myself. and, in case it isn't 'ours', are they another country's spy planes? or something from 'elsewhere'? does anyone at mufon try to check out such sky objects when we report sightings?
content.summary: Red flickering lights at periphery of a huge but unseen sort of triangular-shaped flying structure.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer, when out of the corner of my eye i noticed a vibrant flashing light outside my sliding glass door. i looked straight at the light and realized just how distinct the pulses were. so i observed it standing in my doorway and could not make out any movement. i sat back down and kept an eye on the object to see if it tracked through the sky like a star, peeking back up every 3 or 4 minutes. after about 25-30 minutes the light was still in the same spot above the trees. at this point i grabbed the digital camera and snapped at least 15 photos, using the door frame to steady myself and hitting the button slowly to allow saving of each photo. after about another hour, clouds obscured my view and it was not around anymore. i looked to the sky in that spot every night since, hoping to see the same light, tracking in the sky, like a star or satelite. i did not see the object again until 10-7-2006 around 10:30pm, and this time i had 5 witnesses to verify an odd pulsing light and the other 30+ pictures taken this time. i would like to offer these photos for whatever scrutiny just to find out what we have seen. i have had my eyes to the sky since i was very young, dreaming of piloting, being an astronaut, and always enjoying the stars. this is by far the oddest thing i have ever seen and could not be explained away easily. i even have a reference star to exhibit the steadiness of the camera and swaying movement of the object. it is my opinion that this was a very distant viewing. i have many photos to see,but gave forth the best three that shiws it is not normal. i was using a kodak easyshare dx7630 with the schneider-kreuznach aftermarket 3x optical lens and was zoomed to the max to take most of the photos.
content.summary: Strange pulsing light in the sky, just above trees and distant-photos attached

content.detailedDescription:
On october 6, 2006, during the full harvest moon i snapped off a few pictures while taking my dog out. the sky and the moon were absolutely beautiful! at the time i was taking these photo's there was absolutely no air traffic whatsoever. later, after i had come in and downloaded my pictures i was amazed! the lights i captured in the sky that are moving and darting in and out of the clouds and changing really took me by surprise. i have six pictures all together with these lights in them. i wish i could show them to everyone in full screen and in the order i took them because it is like watching a mini movie as you can clearly see how the lights are moving through the sky.  

i took these photos without flash with a konica minolta 12 x zoom, anti-shake digital camera.

thanks,
michelle
content.summary: Lights in night sky moving in and out of the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was on the 4th floor balcony overlooking the atlantic ocean. i was looking at planets and stars with binoculars. i saw a fast moving object tht i thought was a plane. i began watching it through the binoculars. it caught my attention because it was moving very fast across the sky. it appeared as a flashing white light. it was quite far off in the distance, beyond the pier which is approx 2 - 2.5 miles from my building. as i watched, i thought my hands were moving because the object appeared to jump around. i tracked the object and i steadied my hands against the rail and as i looked for the object, it had disappeared, however, there were many small red sparks or flashes of light above, around, under, and over where the object would have been. the red lights sparkled one at a time, and then disappeared also.I thought maybe the object had gone into the clouds and i just couldn't see it, however, it never reappeared. i felt like it disappeared because someone on it knew it had been seen.
content.summary: As i was looking at planets through binoculars over the atlantic, i saw a fast moving plane. i watched it and it moved erraticaly, and then disappeared, but where it had been, many small sparkes of red tiny  flashes filled the sky.

content.detailedDescription: The aircraft, appeared to be shaped like the fighter crafts in the star wars movies. it had blue/green lights on one wing and red lights on the other. it also had a fairly bright light beaming from what seemed like the cockpit area. at the end of each wing there were flaps perpendicular to the wings. i don't know if this is accurate, but it appeared to have lights that extended from the front, though as i said i don't know if i actually saw the antennae like lights or perhaps a cloud or something played tricks on my eyes. i was outside my yard smoking a cigarette in glendora when i first saw the craft flying very low heading northwest. i took notice only because the red and blue lights on the plane looked like a police siren. as it got closer and flew overhead i saw the unusual shape and took note of the slow speed. then nearly an hour later i saw it again flying back toward the area where i first encountered the ufo. that is when i saw the headlight contraptions and became frustrated i was the only one awake. i've been trying to look up possible explanations on the web but i really don't know where to start. did anyone else see it?
content.summary: An odd aircraft flying ver low over the foothills slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my two friends around 2 oclock in the morning when we came to a red light. we stopped and i saw what i thought was a low flying plane so i pointed it out to my friends. but then it looked like a helicopter but it was flying way to low. then all at the same time we realized that there were more lights that were not shaped like a helicopter. it was directly across the intersection above the street light about 30 yards up. it was coming diagonal and then it stopped. we all yelled at the same time, "my god thats not a helicopter!" it then just stopped and began to turn over, this is when we saw that it was huge and a rectangular shape. it then did a bit of a dip turning verticle. this is when we saw lots of bright lights that were very large. it then flipped over and started going in the other direction. we were able to follow it for a few blocks. as we were following it, it was moving very low to the ground and going very very slow. then the lights went from being just gold to having more lights around it to white. then at the front a whole sheet of white across the front started flashing, thats when we lost it. it looked as if a car was driving through the air at one point. we had to pull over because we couldn't believe what we just saw. the car was silent and my friend took over driving for me. so we started back for the road home and i called my friend, when one of my friends in the car yelled, "there it is again!" we were on a main road and had green lights all the way down but had to stop to look at it. it was still in the same position just stopped, there were about 15 other cars at this time also with green lights that had stopped to look at it too. then it went into a residential neighborhood slowly, it was above the houses, but we were still able to see it, then it started lowering. i was describing this to my friend on the phone as it was happening. it started getting lower and lower and as it was the lights were turning red and flashing, then we stopped by where we thought we saw it then it flashed and we lost lost it. the whole sky went dark after it disappeared. we went down about 20 blocks and then there suddenly were a lot of helicopters in the sky with bright lights, we figured that they were on a hunt for what we had seen. later about 5 minutes when i got home there was a huge plane with really bright search lights in the skyflying low, and my dog was freaking out running and scratching just acting unusual than she normally does. we weren't scared when we saw it. we didn't really now how to react we were all yelling at each other stuff like, "are you seeing this", "is this really happening" and while we were following it we were bitting our nails in silence. after we were all silent just taking in what we had seen. while most people do not believe what we saw when we tell them, thats fine because we all know what we saw, it was huge and one of the most exciting experiences of my life. it was a real rush and i am happy that i could experience what i saw, cuz i have definately never seen anything like it at all!
content.summary: Looked like a low flying helicopter until it got closer then it was bright and flashing and real low to the ground moving extremely slow

content.detailedDescription: Around 16:00, on oct 7, 2006, i was getting out of my car at my local grocery store. i looked up and noticed a white cylinder shaped object. my first thougts, it was an high flying airplane. since the object was in the direction of dfw airport. i continued to observe and noticed that it wasn't moving like a plane or a ballon. it appeared to just sit there and float. i watched the object for 10 or so minutes and went into the store. when i left the store the object was still there and it did appeared to move a little. i rushed home and took out my binoculars and a spotters scope. i had a little better detail of the object. it sort of looked cylinder in shape with bright goldish lights in front. the object wasn't rotating but it did appear to moving. the goldish lights where very bright and steady. according to my gps , the object was in a nnw direction.At times it would disappear and reappear, i continued to watch the object for about an hour and a half. i would go out and check on it every thrity minutes or so. around 20:00 the object was still there but not as bright. around 21:00 the object was gone but there was contrails. 4-5 of them, crossing in the same path where the object was. i don't believe it was a weather ballon being that close to the dfw airport. i know it wasn't a planet or a star. i normally figure out what something is by the flight pattern or shape. i was stumped with this one, the size was about, using my fingers, was about 1 degree in size, the shape - cylider and spherical, and the light it was emitting.
content.summary: Cylinder shape w/o optics, w optics spherical w gold lights
